pages.text: Atoms, also referred to as Reagents, are the building blocks of the universe. As such, they are used to create a variety of resources when combined.$(br)Glyphs modify or augment reagents in specific and various ways.$(br)The Product Accepter consumes reagents in a particular arrangement, called Recipes, and produces an output. Recipes are selected in this book and applied to an Accepter.
